name: Goblin Club
description: A crude club made by goblins, usually used to bludgeon enemies in close combat.
looks: The goblin club is made from a large, gnarled tree branch with a rough, uneven surface. It has a heavy, blunt end that is used for striking opponents.

name: Elven Bow
description: An intricately crafted bow made from the wood of the ancient elven trees.
looks: The Elven Bow is made from a beautiful golden wood, with delicate carvings of elven symbols along its length. It has a smooth and elegant shape, with perfectly curved limbs and a reinforced grip.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases the damage and accuracy of ranged attacks.

name: Amulet of Wisdom
description: An enchanted amulet that enhances the wearer's wisdom and magical abilities.
looks: The Amulet of Wisdom is made of a silver chain with a crystal pendant in the shape of a swirling potion bottle. The crystal is vibrant blue and emits a soft glow.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells cast by the wearer.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Short Sword
description: A simple short sword with a straight blade and a basic hilt. It is a versatile weapon suitable for close combat.
looks: The short sword has a straight blade that tapers to a sharp point. The blade is made of steel and is about two feet long. The hilt is made of wood and is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.sword: The user gains a bonus to Sword skill when wielding this weapon.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a sparkling ruby gemstone.
looks: The Ruby Ring is made of polished gold, with intricate filigree designs on the band. The center of the ring holds a large ruby gemstone that catches the light and sparkles with a deep red hue.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a silver finish. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword_fighting: Grants a bonus to Sword Fighting skill.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy steel gauntlets that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates with reinforced padding on the inside. They cover the entire hand, extending up to the forearm.

name: Longsword of the Falcon
description: A finely crafted longsword with a falcon motif engraved on the hilt. It is known for its speed and precision in battle.
looks: The Longsword of the Falcon has a polished steel blade with a slight curve. The hilt is made of leather and wrapped tightly around the grip. The pommel features a detailed falcon head design.

special_weapon_skils.swordmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.falcon_strike: Has a chance to deal extra damage with a powerful strike.

name: Steel Gauntlets
looks: The gauntlets are made of solid steel with a brushed finish. They have a fingerless design, allowing for better dexterity and grip.

name: Broad Sword
description: A large, heavy sword with a wide blade, designed for powerful swings and maximum damage.
looks: The broad sword has a long, straight blade with a double-edged design. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and it has a simple yet solid crossguard.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to cause bleeding damage on hit.

name: Mithril Sword
description: A legendary sword forged from pure mithril, known for its unparalleled strength and sharpness.
looks: The Mithril Sword has a slender blade that glows with a faint blue hue. The hilt is intricately designed with engravings of mythical creatures, and the handle is wrapped in fine leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a simple crossguard and a wooden handle wrapped in leather.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.
